Text.Page:
Our scouts spotted pieces of argon-style pylons in an old Valkyon post northeast of here. Is that even possible?

You'll have to fight your way past {@LinkCreature:45#2001#argonomorph blood fiends} to find out, but I really need to know.
These samples should tell the tale. I hope they don't tell me what I'm afraid they're going to.
If I had samples of those pylons, I could get some tests started.
